resources.string: Device will be muted on shutdown
Device will NOT be muted on shutdown
Silent Boot requires additional permissions to mute and un-mute your phone.\n\nPlease enable Do Not Disturb access.
Indicates that Silent Boot is active.\nRequired for Silent Boot to work properly.
Silent Boot mutes your phone on shutdown to keep it quiet on boot and restores the previous ringer mode after startup is complete.

Silent Boot requires a service that can react to the event of your phone shutting down. Since Android is very restrictive about what apps can do while you are not directly interacting with them, this service must display a constant notification.
